title: New York and London Are Letting Working Women Down
itunes:title: New York and London Are Letting Working Women Down
description:
Dr. Darshak Sanghavi, Chief Medical Officer at Babylon, on how digital health is fighting the pandemic and the closing of Babylon’s SPAC merger. The Bloomberg BIG TAKE with Bloomberg Businessweek Solutions & Strategy Editor Rebecca Penty on How New York and London Have Let Working Women Down. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Finance Reporter Robert Schmidt on Biden’s Banking Watchdog Pick Gets Mired in Political Spectacle. Bloomberg News Personal Finance Editor Ben Steverman on Democrats’ New Tax Target Is $5 Trillion in Billionaire Wealth. Bloomberg News Reporter Covering Tech and the FCC Todd Shields on China Telecom’s Permission to Operate in U.S. Revoked by FCC. And we Drive to the Close with Michael Sheldon, Chief Investment Officer at Hightower RDM.

Hosted by Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
